calculate_k_cross_function()

Perform cross-K function

calculate_k_function()

calculate_k_function, calculates Ripley's K-function with border correction with options to specify cell phenotype, plot, plot confidence envelope and plot confidence interval of K function. Plotted K-functions utilise an inhomogenous Poisson distrubution with point intensity produced to reflect the original data as the null distribution. Unable to plot both condience interval and envelope simultaneously
